Introduction

Chae Joo Hwa, formerly known as Lime, is a South Korean rapper, singer, and actress under Fantagio. She is a former member of the girl group HELLOVENUS under Fantagio Music.

She made her HELLOVENUS debut on May 9, 2012, with the release of the group's first mini album Venus, going by the stage name Lime.

On April 26, 2019, Fantagio Music announced that HELLOVENUS would be disbanding after seven years. Additionally, they revealed Lime was still discussing renewing her contract with the agency. Fantagio then announced on July 12 on that same year that Lime had chosen to extend her contract and will be carrying on with her acting career under the stage name Chae Joo Hwa. On 2021, she was removed from the company's official artists page, signaling her departure.

On January 27, 2022, it was announced that she is getting married to a non-celebrity husband and on May 20, 2023, she announced her pregnancy. She then announced the birth of her child on October 7, 2023.
